titles.title: Prevent Emergency and Disaster Profiteering Act of 2020
Prevent Emergency and Disaster Profiteering Act of 2020
A bill to prohibit price gouging for necessary products during federally declared national emergencies or disasters.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: Prevent Emergency and Disaster Profiteering Act of 2020 This bill makes it unlawful for any person to sell or offer for sale a designated good or service at a price that is unconscionably excessive during a federally-declared emergency or disaster. The Department of Health and Human Services may designate a list of necessary goods or services during an emergency period and establish a margin over which an increase in the average price of such goods or services is deemed unconscionably excessive.
